website_summaries.verdict: The best value deodorant for active men who want extra sweat resistance during heavy exercise.
pros: Long-lasting coverage is actually close to the advertised 48 hour protection
Doesn't leave any type of residue as it dries
Comes as a value pack of two
cons: Smell can seem strong after active use

website_summaries.verdict: This clear gel keeps you fresh all day. The subtle masculine scent invigorates and keeps you dry all day.
pros: The non-staining clear gel antiperspirant controls odor and wetness for 24-hours: smells great, works, great
cons: Some users comment that the get is drying to armpit skin and especially irritating after shaving

customer_reviews.title: Will not be buying products that gender-shame men in their advertisements
customer_reviews.text: This product was cheap and I normally dont write review, but after their new gender-shaming ad against men I will review it 1 star. The knob doesnt turn properly to disperse the deodorant on either of the 2 I bought. There are so many air bubbles in this container that its a half full stick. I will not be buying Gillette products again.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob C

customer_reviews.title: Do NOT buy!
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product if it's going to be shipped anywhere even remotely warm! I have ordered this deodorant twice now, and out of four sticks, none have worked, I assume due to the temperature of the trucks in which they were delivered. The turning mechanism will not raise the deodorant at all, so if you intend to buy this product, do so from a store rather than having it shipped. I am very disappointed and will be requesting a refund again.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: This makes the third one i have bought and they were all like this! I will not buy anymore on here
customer_reviews.text: Both of my deodorants bottom caps came off and the gel went everywhere! This makes the third one i have bought and they were all like this! I will not buy anymore on here!
customer_reviews.author: ts101

customer_reviews.title: Great odor protection, mediocre applicator
customer_reviews.text: I hoped this would be better. I works great from an odor protection standpoint. It's sort of a mess to apply, a gel that does stain dark clothes if you don't let it dry completely. It's hard to modulate the amount of gel that comes out of the head holes when screwing the base adjustment by hand. Not an ideal applicator for sure
customer_reviews.author: RolidnotTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Game changer
customer_reviews.text: I've had problems with irritation in the past from gel deodorants. I mistakenly ordered this in my prime pantry box thinking it was the advanced solid version, but instead was the gel. I decided to give it a try, and I couldn't be happier. Not only does this work better than other brands I've had, but it also works better than the advanced solid, and requires less to work. I've been thoroghly impressed, and would recommend this to anyone needing some serious sweat protection.
customer_reviews.author: D J Davis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. Fantastic product. EZ 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: Gels are farrr superior in every way of any of the "top3bigbrands". Longlasting, comfort, ease of use, non staining, gels allow much wider range of fragrance and some will even get you comments on your "cologne" or "aftershave". Obviously like any fragrance they are different on each individual just like colognes, but just a bit of experiment (like col.or as) and you'll find your fit. I love Gillette as well as Right Guards gels. I mix-it-up just to have different fragrances that "work" better with certain colognes. Some are just better fits to the nose. All* are fantastic deodorants though. Buy this and you will enjoy & never buy a solid again.
customer_reviews.author: SGM Cottrell, K

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising!! Doesn't stay clear.
customer_reviews.text: This product says it "goes on clear, stays clear." This is out right false. It goes on clear but dries yellowish. If it gets on your clothes it will make it look like you have sweat stains. I know this because it has colored several of my shirts low down (as a result of putting it on before the deodorant dried). Buyer beware.
customer_reviews.author: An Honest Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: The BEST!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only deodorant that does not cause me to get a rash and break out under my arms. Love the clear gel. Only complaint is that it can stain your clothes. I noticed this on my tee shirts that the arm pits are turning colors or fading if you will. Not that big of a deal to me but something that you might want to think about. The scent of this is excellent as well as I am always getting compliments on what I am wearing. Funny thing is I only have on my deodorant!
customer_reviews.author: Fawndelmajunc

customer_reviews.title: Horrid
customer_reviews.text: I wish I read the reviews before I bought this product what a waste of money. The knobs don’t work so the deodorant doesn’t move up. I have to turn it upside down to get any of the gel.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Archibald

customer_reviews.title: Gilette Deoderant Gel Aloe scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my new deodorant. Since they no longer make the deodorant I used for 15+ years it was time to find new. Many deodorants have such a heavy odor I can't tolerate them. I searched through men's deodorants one day, and found this brand. The odor is very pleasant, not strong at all. Plus it works well to keep me dry.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy Banish

customer_reviews.title: gets used up very quickly. does not do the best job of protection.
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant gets used up very quickly. The gel is very soft, you need a lot of it. Many times it would be overflowing and get wasted. The smell is pretty nice but it's not strong at all. Barely there. Worst of all, it does not do the best job of protection. last a few hours, not as good as the sticks. But at least it goes on clear.
customer_reviews.author: Punn Wiantrakoon

customer_reviews.title: Good Smell and Long Protection without the Mess
customer_reviews.text: Good set of deodorant/antiperspirant that has been holding up so far. I switched from Dove, because the white stick would flake and get every where in my bathroom drawer. The gel takes getting used to but for sure goes on very smooth, dries clear, and smells great. It doesn't last as long as my previous deodorants but that is expected from a gel vs a solid. This is less of a mess and easier to apply. I recommend to anyone tired of the flaking mess of other deodorant sticks.
customer_reviews.author: nk.digital | Technology Enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Grease Stains in Pits
customer_reviews.text: This, in my opinion, was a terrible product. The gel remains sticky and almost wet feeling well into the day. It leaves horrible dark marks on your underarms and stains through the shirt, even when you're not sweating. This happens even if you fully dry your underarm with a hair dryer or towel after application. I wear Wool and Prince and Arcterxy t-shirts and button downs, it was disastrous for them - large hard to remove grease looking spots.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good
customer_reviews.text: Every time that my husband would shave his beard he would use Gillette’s shaving cream and I LOVED the smell. I wanted to buy some Gillette cologne for me to wear so I could smell like it since I love the smell so much, but I couldn’t find any...so I bought some of their deodorant. I absolutely love it. I might smell like a man now, but damn I smell good.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Harden

customer_reviews.title: Great for physical jobs
customer_reviews.text: My husband has used this brand for as long as I can remember. He has a very physical job and this keeps him smelling great all day. Every time we've tried another product we've gone right back to this one. Can be a little pricier than some of the other brands but it's truly worth it and on the subscribe and save it's an even better value.
customer_reviews.author: Gina A. Marandino

customer_reviews.title: Smells ok but the sweat is unbearable
customer_reviews.text: Let me preface this by saying I’ve never had a sweating problem before. However, after using this product, I have noticed an immediate uptick in visible sweat during work. (It’s winter mind you and it’s freezing this year). It does not last very long either. Disappointing product.
customer_reviews.author: Vinnyo94

customer_reviews.title: It works 24 hours.
customer_reviews.text: It works OK but if the air temperature gets a little warm it tends to liquify in the container more than I'd like. This causes it to flow out the end into the lid a bit. If they changed the viscosity slightly it'd be better. I'll buy it again though.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This has been my go-to for the past year because it is comfortable, smells good, and does not stain my clothes. I've had issues in the past where deodorants will leave a ring around the armpits, and if not washed out quickly it would set and pretty much be permanently stained. The gel does make it more messy compared to traditional stick deodorants, however as long as you take your time and slide only as much as you need it should not be a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Andres

customer_reviews.title: USE IT!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this brand for years - mainly because of the two-pack. It seems like I've used it forever. This has kept me smell-free and dry in Iraq, Afghanistan, at the office, on the trail, at the beach, and every other place that I've been every day for that past ten or more years. No one around me has complained!
customer_reviews.author: Bob De Bexar

customer_reviews.title: What a Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: I went to Duane Reede to get deodorant cause I was sweaty and stanky. I found this deodorant and it was like $8!! What the heck?! I ain't paying that much for 3.8oz of deodorant just so people aren't offended of my stank. So I went home and my girlfriend told me to check Amazon and I did and holy crud! I got two for the price of one!! So now I have it and I don't stink and I saved $$.
customer_reviews.author: H. Cowger

customer_reviews.title: I have used this for years and plan to for the next several years as well
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for years. It works well and is affordable. It goes on easily and does not leave any residue or anything. More comfortable than most deodorants and has been a staple in my house for myself and kids for years. Smells good too. I will continue to buy this product for the near future for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Derek D

customer_reviews.title: Smells too much
customer_reviews.text: It works as far as preventing BO and sweat, but the smell is overpowering and smells like shaving cream.
customer_reviews.author: em489

customer_reviews.title: Ease of order and long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: I was super excited when I found out I could order these, as well as subscribe to receive them every certain amount of time via Amazon. I am saving a lot of money and the worry of having to stop by the store every time I run out of deodorant. Scent is perfect and it lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Love the Cool Wave Scent but no match for my manliness
customer_reviews.text: I've always been a fan of the Cool Wave scent, and it has served me well on the Applebees dating circuit. This is no different, nice, clean, refreshing scent. It just doesn't seem to hold back my man funk as well as Old Spice Swagger... sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: These are the best, these are clear gels unlike any other deo ...
customer_reviews.text: These are the best, these are clear gels unlike any other deo sticks. Be sure to apply little by little and spread it all over the pits. I love them so much I won't switch other deo sticks. Just be careful while putting on T shirts after applying it, let it dry for a while. Bcoz when you put on the tee immediately after applying this you would get white creases on the shirt on the part where it touches the arm pits while putting the Tees on.
customer_reviews.author: Vegito_Blue

customer_reviews.title: Smells good. Gel is horrible.
customer_reviews.text: Smells like the aftershave, which is good. The gel is horrifically bad. It takes a long time to feel dry and squirts out into the inside of the cap, causing gloops of deodorant to fall out periodically.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Really bad rash from this deodorant.
customer_reviews.text: Tried a few other sticks of deodorant I have to make sure it wasn't just this one, but it is. I don't know what they put in here that the other brands didn't, but it's terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Evan T

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long in a hot kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I love gel deodorants specifically because they do not mat my armpit hair or stain shirts. This one specifically is great because the smell is subtle, and it lasts me through a full shift in a hot kitchen
customer_reviews.author: Cal

customer_reviews.title: Gillette cool wave gel antiperspirant
customer_reviews.text: Gillette cool wave gel antiperspirant is good smelling long lasting stuff. Miss the clear powder but it seems all gel is what they make now. Curiously they do a sport in clear powder but stopped others? Talc lawsuits??
customer_reviews.author: Keith

customer_reviews.title: Gillette Gel Review
customer_reviews.text: This gel has an awesome scent and goes on really easily. The only issue I’m having is the twist knob is a little stiff which makes it difficult to actually push the gel out. Other than that, I’m happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't leave any dirt on cloths has a nice smell and I didn't smell any bad odors. I would def buy it again. I got 3 packs for 7.99 so that's a good price, maybe would consider waiting for a good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Roy and Rachel bachar

customer_reviews.title: Best value and experience
customer_reviews.text: After my second purchase, I decided to give this a review. I like the feeling of gel on my underarm instead of those “creamy bars”. It feels cool and dries quickly, it’s a great product to use during summer.
customer_reviews.author: Terence

customer_reviews.title: Great value and smell
customer_reviews.text: It's one of very few deodorants that don't cause irritation for my husband that I enjoy the smell of. Cool wave smells wonderful. I prefer it to cologne on him. With subscribe & save it is definitely a better price than walmart.
customer_reviews.author: tracy wilson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent odor protection
customer_reviews.text: The gel offered long term protection from underarm odor and also worked better than anticipated as an antiperspirant. And as it was relatively inexpensive compared to similar products in its category group I can only highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for a few hours
customer_reviews.text: This used to be my brand but something has changed and it now only works as an antiperspirant for a few hours now so was having to reapply a few times a day. I changed brands and haven't had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: loco1529

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the two products. First one was fine, but the second one the little dispenser knob wouldn’t turn and dispense the deodorant. I had to throw a whole new one in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Kari S.

customer_reviews.title: Unreliable!  Can't get the deodorant to come out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and when i turn the bottom of the container to bring up the deodorant, nothing happens! so completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Abbas K.

customer_reviews.title: Best fit for me
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every type/scent/gender-specific/clinical type of antiperspirant/deodorant on the market and this is the ONLY stuff that has ever worked for me. Been using it for years and will continue.
customer_reviews.author: Mondoness

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: No bad smell last for hours absorb all bad smell even when you sweet doesn't smell bad it just great using it for so many years not gonna change it
customer_reviews.author: Dusan T.

customer_reviews.title: As good as it gets.
customer_reviews.text: Long-lasting coverage in mid-summer hot hole of South Florida. One stick lasts for months, no goop under arms, no torque or chalk marks on shirts, and you can’t beat that baby.
customer_reviews.author: RonDoe

customer_reviews.title: Misleading banner
customer_reviews.text: The banner claims that the product is aluminum-free. It isn't, as looking at the bottom left of the product's image shows, and also later down in the product description. if you're looking for an aluminum-free product, this isn't it.
customer_reviews.author: John G

customer_reviews.title: Men's Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price... No powder to flake off onto your shirt. Smell is good and fresh. You must twist and twist for it to eventually start working.
customer_reviews.author: justmuse

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I buy these in bulk for my son in college and my husband. Lasts all day! It's great for stinky boys and girls on a day where our antiperspirants dont work as well. Smells really good.
customer_reviews.author: dustiharling

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all, it leaves the armpit area sticky like if you applied some glue. There are better options.
customer_reviews.author: Francis

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: This deodorant doesn’t necessarily warm me up, but I do have a fresh set throughout the day. Doing what deodorant is meant to do!
customer_reviews.author: David Baird

customer_reviews.title: Love men's deodorant!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a female who loves to wear men's deodorant! I love the sexy scents and the strength of the mens products. I love this scent & the gel & Gilette is a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: I grabbed 2 on the go...Gillette Cool Wave...
customer_reviews.text: Gillette cool wave is for camping,Sports activities,or just a Monday-Sunday protective clear gel for your body.I grabbed 2 to go with prices like this on Amazon.Everyone have a sweet day Doctors recommend this more than Old Spice.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony L Burns

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs Up 👍
customer_reviews.text: Internet article rated this product as one of the top men’s deodorants. Lasts a long time, it works, no allergic reaction
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective, but smell good
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were going to be great, but BOTH deodorants don't work. The knob at the bottom is hard to get started (took me a few days and a few people to even get it to start moving) and even when it did, the liquid doesn't come up. I thought I just had one defective one, but both we're unable to work. They smell good and I wish they would work, but no deodorant liquid comes out, despite turning the knob every which way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product and works
customer_reviews.text: Husband’s favorite so I like delivery instead of searching all the thousands of products on the shelves at the store.
customer_reviews.author: Debpip

customer_reviews.title: Nice light scent, good order control
customer_reviews.text: Great light scent, good odor control, and is not itchy or heavy on the residue. Takes a little longer to dry before dressing, but not a big issue.
customer_reviews.author: NKMc

customer_reviews.title: One of the few brand products that is clearly better than others.
customer_reviews.text: This is what I and my wife always use. It does not smell overwhelming and protects us from body odor all day long. We rarely need to reapply during the same day. It is a gel like substance when you apply that feels wet, but it dries after some time and although you cannot feel it working, it is definitely there. Packaging was the exact same as buying a two pack in the store but the price and convenience was much better! Fantastic product, Gillette.
customer_reviews.author: JAB

customer_reviews.title: no good
customer_reviews.text: very sticky mess under arm especially mess for my shirts
customer_reviews.author: Fatos

customer_reviews.title: Husband needs more.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the one I bought from the other online site. It is almost gone. Need to buy another set after this review. :P
customer_reviews.author: Asawa ni Steve

customer_reviews.title: Worthless.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is mostly worthless after about thirty minutes. I will go back to 'old spice' at least it works.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Bad design
customer_reviews.text: System and how it’s spoused operate was a horrible idea, maybe it has something to do with the temperature but the gel simply won’t come out
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells great and longevity beast.
customer_reviews.text: Pitts stay dry for at least two days. Very hard to get off when showering. I like the gels because the regular stuff hardly works.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Mistake buying the gel
customer_reviews.text: I prefer the application of solid deodorant and would not purchase the gel again. Too hard to control the volume of product being applied.
customer_reviews.author: CES

customer_reviews.title: my favorite deodorant
customer_reviews.text: after years of looking around, I've finally found my favorite deodorant. These are very easy to apply, smell great, and last for a long time. My only issue is sometimes the container does not function well and the final 10-15% at the bottom of the bottle goes to waste
customer_reviews.author: Sid Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this product, the gel knob turns ...
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product, the gel knob turns but nothing come out. I bought 2 packages equaling a total of 4 deodorants and they all have the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: llm88ci

customer_reviews.title: Hate the gel
customer_reviews.text: The gel sucks, don't buy! I would rather use the hard solid deodorants, and runs out quick.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart

customer_reviews.title: The batch delivered to me was defective
customer_reviews.text: Could not advance the gel in the containers by rotating the provided dial on the bottom. Too bad. It seemed like it could have been a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sidney Richman

customer_reviews.title: Very good gel
customer_reviews.text: I used to buy the non aloe vera Gillette. This one is just as good. I will probably buy the least expensive of the two. I think this one is less expensive so I will repeat buy.
customer_reviews.author: Alex R

customer_reviews.title: lasts long for me compared to most
customer_reviews.text: Works great lasts long. Gross going on but after a min it's soaks in. The dispenser itself needs some more design improvement. It's hard to explain but it's just messy and seems flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Deodorant
customer_reviews.text: This product works really well. Its scent is not overbearing and it keeps me dry.
customer_reviews.author: William Ackerman

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great!
customer_reviews.text: Like this product because unlike Old spice who seem to jack up their prices after you first purchase it was affordable and keeps me smelling fresh.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Good products, does what it should do.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scent, have to wait for it to dry if you’re going to put on a polo shirt or something that is dark colored. Reliable and does the job protecting against sweating and more so odor.
customer_reviews.author: Professor

customer_reviews.title: Smells greats & lasts long
customer_reviews.text: Ive been buying Gillette gel deodorant for years it's my favorite ! Scent and duration is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon's #1 Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product - old and stinks.
customer_reviews.text: Expired product that stinks. Avoid as they sell several-year-old items obviously.
customer_reviews.author: Gatlin

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good [roduct - pretty much scent free & does what its meant to do. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Marshall

customer_reviews.title: It works well as a deodorant, but as an ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well as a deodorant, but as an antiperspirant it's a joke. Infact, it became the source of more sweat production.
customer_reviews.author: bugopc1

customer_reviews.title: Lasts to long
customer_reviews.text: You cannot wash this stuff off with anything less than burning gasoline.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McSpadden

customer_reviews.title: Gilette brand!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell of this deodorant on me! Not overbearing just right!
customer_reviews.author: Carlos H. Davila Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Provides good protection but very strong smell so will opt for softer scent next time.
customer_reviews.author: Szb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Same deodorant I’ve been using for over 10 years love it and it never fails
customer_reviews.author: Julio Patino

customer_reviews.title: My one and only
customer_reviews.text: This is the only deodorant that doesn’t give me a rash or burning sensation. Smells great and lasts me all day!
customer_reviews.author: Loi Masina

customer_reviews.title: No shower for 3 days
customer_reviews.text: This stuff rocks. Keeps you fresh for days if needed. Expensive and a very small amount in the package but runs right past all the other high endurance deodorants.
customer_reviews.author: Andy T

customer_reviews.title: Great scent with no white flakes
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used this deodorant for decades now, and love the scent and quality. It doesn’t stain your clothes and fights body Oder for 24 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Stop Me If You've Smelled This One Before
customer_reviews.text: Stop me if you've smelled this one before, you still smell me, you still smell me, only slightly less than you used to, my love. With a hat-tip to the Smiths. I've used this deodorant for 20+ years and I stink less than I used to. So... yeah. And I don't sweat through as many shirts. So.. Great.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Great product to buy
customer_reviews.text: I have nothing to say but buy this it is great smell good and keeps the sweat away
customer_reviews.author: Loyal Shopper

customer_reviews.title: I've used this for years.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product for years. Good product and a good price. Makes me happy.
customer_reviews.author: William Higley, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for money product. I loved use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: puneet upadhyay

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I've always liked Gillet and there deodorant because its different from, everyone else's. The gel stuff lasts a lot longer then most deodorant brands which is good because I work long hours at a restaurant.
customer_reviews.author: jake copeland

customer_reviews.title: 2X bought 2X failed to work!
customer_reviews.text: Second one ordered and it failed to work. Had to squeeze it out and that only lasted about 10% of the product. Poorly designed. I wished I could get a credit or money back. Won't be a third purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Chris King

customer_reviews.title: Favorite buy
customer_reviews.text: This has been my brand since my younger days. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: A new liquid concept.
customer_reviews.text: Rotate the knob to get out what you need and apply. Uses less than sticky deterrent.
customer_reviews.author: Buck 55369

customer_reviews.title: Good product thanks
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad deodorant the smell is a gentle clean smell
customer_reviews.author: Arthur greenwood

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this product
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy made my armpits itch after prolonged use. Better products for price point.
customer_reviews.author: Omar

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: This is the only deodorant I use. If I forget to apply, I'm covered for an extra 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic deal, but this deodorant is just "okay
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic deal, but this deodorant is just "okay." I don't feel the gel comes out evenly or reliably. I feel like it is extremely wet and slimy most of the time because the tube is incapable of putting out just the right amount. It DOES do the trick, but there is much better gel deodorant out there.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chambers

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely
customer_reviews.text: It does the job it was intended to. Although you tend to run out faster than solids.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Snair

customer_reviews.title: Great Deodorant For The Price!
customer_reviews.text: The smell is about what you would think It would be, just the sport mens smell but It works great and lasts a long time. Would highly recommend It Only gave the scent 4 stars because It's nothing special but It's not bad either.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Anthony Harry

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love the value. It's a good deodorant. I prefer this clear gel over any.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Brimer

customer_reviews.title: Dont know
customer_reviews.text: The screw doesnt work bought 2 I dont know about the second one I have to press it to have the gel out lol
customer_reviews.author: Maro Graves

customer_reviews.title: Good money deal
customer_reviews.text: My husband love this deodorant.. This deal is perfect for the price
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not the beat smelling but last all day and good price. Rather small kinda good then like b.o. so I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Rubio.

customer_reviews.title: Long Lasting and Very Effective
customer_reviews.text: This Deodorant's scent lasts a very long time. The scent lasted over 24 hours. You can really feel the cooling gel all day long but in a good way, it does not burn or tingle. For the price, I would definitely recommend ordering this two-pack.
customer_reviews.author: Hussein

customer_reviews.title: Great product no dry residue left under arms
customer_reviews.text: Great product keeps u dry throughout day & feeling fresh
customer_reviews.author: Fabian G

customer_reviews.title: Defective item
customer_reviews.text: I like this product but it is defective. As I turn the knob the deodorant doesn’t come out. I’ve tried by turning knob several times. A. Andrade
customer_reviews.author: Alfredo A.

customer_reviews.title: Hardens and flakes into sandlike particles
customer_reviews.text: The product smells great however after applying the deodorant, little pieces will harden and flake off in small chunks that feel like little pieces of sand. Beware, do not apply this heading to bed or you are in for a bed full of deodorant sand. Very terrible side effect of deodorant.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Gillette Cool Wave Clear Gel Men’s Antiperspirant and Deodorant 3.8 oz each 2-Pack Packaging may Vary
product_meta.description:
Color:Cool Wave Twin PackGillette Cool Wave Clear Gel Men’s Antiperspirant Deodorant gives you 48 hours of sweat and odor protection. With Scent XTend technology providing fade resistant scent, the precision engineered formula will keep you fresh all day. Gillette Clear Gel goes on clear and stays on clear, giving you invisible sweat protection.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


view larger Stay confident with Gillette Clear Gel Anti-Perspirant/Deodorant. Gillette Clear Gel provides all-day protection from wetness and odor. Its triple protection formula contains active odor blockers, a transparent dry shield, and all-day scent technology that goes on clear and lasts all day. Keep your cool in any situation with Gillette Clear Gel.

AT A GLANCE
 * #1 Men’s Clear Gel Anti-Perspirant/Deodorant
 * Built for training
 * Triple Protection System
 * Goes on clear, stays on clear

FOR COMPLETE ODOR PROTECTION, USE THEM TOGETHER
Gillette Clear Gel Cool Wave Anti-Perspirant/Deodorant & Gillette Hydrator Body Wash

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
Why should I use Gillette Clear Gel?
Gillette Clear Gel has Triple Protection technology with Active Odor Blockers and a Transparent Dry Shield, and All Day Scent Technology. Gillette Clear Gel also provides Fast Drying Technology.

Why do we perspire?
Sweating is your body's way of cooling itself by releasing excess heat. Therefore, while sweating is natural under any condition, it can be intensified for any number of reasons, including warm weather, exercise and stress.

What's antiperspirant?
Antiperspirants help block the flow of sweat from sweat glands to reduce wetness. In addition, because perspiration stimulates odor-causing bacteria, antiperspirants also reduce body odor, with scented antiperspirants fighting odor even more.

How do antiperspirants work?
Antiperspirants use sweat against itself. Once applied, the antiperspirant is dissolved by sweat, and the dissolved particles form superficial plugs just below the skin’s surface. These plugs help block the release of perspiration. Generally, the plugs stay in place for about 24 hours and wash away over time.

If sweating is natural, is there any danger in preventing it?
Actually, no. Antiperspirants are designed for usage in your underarm only. Since you have sweat glands all over your body, controlling underarm perspiration has virtually no effect on your body’s ability to cool itself.

What are the varieties of Gillette Clear Gel?
Gillette Clear Gel is available in Cool Wave, Sport, Arctic Ice, Power Rush, and Brisa Tropical scents.

PICK YOUR FORM. PICK YOUR SCENT.
